vouchers.writeUp:
Flipkart went live in 2007 with the objective of making books easily available to anyone who had internet access. Today, we're present across various categories including movies, music, games, mobiles, cameras, computers, healthcare and personal products, home appliances and electronics, stationery, perfumes, toys, apparels, shoes – and still counting!

Be it our path-breaking services like Cash on Delivery, a 30-day replacement policy, EMI options, free shipping - and of course the great prices that we offer, everything we do revolves around our obsession with providing our customers a memorable online shopping experience. Then there's our dedicated Flipkart delivery partners who work round the clock to personally make sure the packages reach on time.

vouchers.writeUp:
The Akshaya Patra Foundation runs the world’s largest Mid-Day Meal (MDM) Program with the help of Government of India and various corporate stakeholders & Individuals. Currently, Akshaya Patra reaches out to 1.67 Million Children every day in 12 states covering 13,800+ Government Schools. The Akshaya Patra Foundation kitchens are ISO certified and are hygienically superior as per FSSAI standards. Akshaya Patra is in the Hall of Fame of ICAI (Institute of Chartered Accountants of India) for having received the Gold Shield Award for financial reporting for 5 years in a row. A Harvard case-study, our programme has garnered multitude of awards including Nikkei Asia Award, Padma Shri award for our Chairman.

The Akshaya Patra’s objective is to eradicate classroom hunger by the provision of hot & unlimited nutritious meals. The Foundation is aiming to reach 5 Million Children by the year 2020.

Support us to fulfill our vision “No Child in India should be deprived of Classroom Hunger”.

For more details, visit:  www.akshayapatra.org
